title: Foundation: O/L and A/L Studies
description: Complete your O/L and A/L examinations in any stream. Strong English language and communication skills are highly advantageous. Taking subjects like Business Studies or Economics can be helpful.

title: Diploma or Degree in Hotel Management
description: Pursue a formal qualification in hospitality or hotel management. This provides structured learning in all key hotel departments such as Front Office, Food & Beverage (F&B), Housekeeping, and Kitchen Operations.
institutes: SLITHM (Sri Lanka Institute of Tourism & Hotel Management)

title: Entry-Level and Supervisory Roles
description: Start your career with an entry-level position (e.g., Receptionist, F&B Captain) and work your way up to a supervisory role. This hands-on experience across different departments is crucial for understanding hotel operations.

title: Departmental Manager
description: Advance to a management position for a specific department, such as Front Office Manager, F&B Manager, or Executive Housekeeper. You will be responsible for the department's budget, staff, and overall performance.
qualifications: Proven track record in a supervisory role
institutes: All major 4-star and 5-star hotel chains in Sri Lanka

title: Hotel Manager / General Manager
description: With extensive experience across multiple departments and strong leadership skills, you can reach the top position of Hotel Manager or General Manager. You will have overall responsibility for the entire hotel's operations, profitability, and guest satisfaction. An MBA can be beneficial for this role.
institutes: N/A - Based on experience and promotion to leadership roles
